channel.title: Daily News
channel.description: 毎日更新のニュースサマリー

item.description: Despite GPT-5’s unified promise, OpenAI reintroduced a model picker with Auto/Fast/Thinking modes and restored access to legacy models. The change reflects strong user preferences and the challenge of...

Datumo raised \$15.5 million to expand its LLM evaluation platform, positioning itself against Scale AI; Salesforce participated in the round. The startup offers no-code evaluation tooling and curated...

Pinterest’s revenue grew 17% and Gen-Z usage hit over half of MAUs, helped by its AI ad suite Performance+. Still, a profit miss and slower user additions weighed on sentiment, highlighting the tensio...
ElevenLabs, best-known for text-to-speech and voice-translation tools, unveiled a generative-music model it says can be used commercially.

Menlo Ventures’ survey shows Anthropic’s Claude family now holds 32 % enterprise share vs. OpenAI’s 25 %. In coding tasks Claude has 42 % share. Enterprises cite safety, reliability and compliance as ...
